verses.text: As charcoal to embers and as wood to fire, so is a quarrelsome man for kindling strife.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 26:21
rsbNotes.text: 26:21 quarrelsome man. Such people are not happy unless they are actively undermining personal relationships.

verses.text: The words of a gossip are like choice morsels; they go down to a man's inmost parts.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 26:22
rsbNotes.text: 26:22 See 18:8 and note.
